title: Driver Jobs 2017 (100 Govt Vacancies Opening)

organizations.name: government organization and government public sector companies

text:
Last Updated Monday, February 20, 2017 Advertisement 
Various Driver Jobs available in State / Central Government Organization and Government Public Sector Companies. Heavy Motor Vehicle (HMV) / Light Motor Vehicle (LMV) License Holders are eligible to apply for Driver Vacancy in Indian Govt Recruitment. IndGovtJobs Blog will be updating every week Driver Government Vacancies 2017.
